Neighboring countries Link: /statistics/226274/perceived-threat-of-a-nuclear-armed-iran-by-neighboring-countries/ and the world have been skeptical of Iran’s nuclear program for the last 15 years. Iran’s nuclear activity is worrisome for many nations around the world and it is feared that Iran’s actions could fuel a nuclear arms race in an already unstable region. Due to these worries, Iran has faced a number of international sanctions to stymie its nuclear capacity. Iran’s economy has suffered because of these international sanctions; even though Iran has the fourth largest oil reserves globally Link: /statistics/237065/share-of-oil-reserves-of-the-leading-ten-countries/ , daily oil production Link: /statistics/451444/possible-impact-of-lifting-sanctions-against-iran-on-oil-production/ has decreased significantly since the first sanctions from the United States were put in place back in 1978.

Increased sanctions in 2012 had a significant impact on Iran's GDP Link: /statistics/294233/iran-gross-domestic-product-gdp/ thereafter, resulting in a short spell of negative growth rates Link: /statistics/294301/iran-gross-domestic-product-gdp-growth/ and turmoil. During the same period, Iran's inflation rate Link: /statistics/294320/iran-inflation-rate/ soared dramatically, reaching over 30 percent. This has been difficult for Iranians, especially as the average per capita GDP Link: /statistics/294245/iran-gross-domestic-product-gdp-per-capita/ dropped significantly at the time in addition to experiencing relatively high rates of unemployment Link: /statistics/294305/iran-unemployment-rate/ . Due to Iran’s troubled relations with the west and many of its neighbors in the Middle East, trade has been limited to countries outside these regions for both exports Link: /statistics/294379/iran-main-export-partners/ and imports Link: /statistics/294389/iran-main-import-partners/ . This has been challenging for Iranian economy.

Iran is working towards improving its international relations and remove sanctions by making its nuclear activities transparent. However, Iran has accumulated a wide range of enemies in the region, and the war in Syria Link: /topics/4216/the-syrian-civil-war/ and contradictory opinions regarding who to support in the region, could intensify already stressed relations. Most recently, relations with Saudi Arabia have deteriorated dramatically, when Iranians protested the execution of 47 men, including a Shiite cleric, on terrorism-related charges in Saudi Arabia. The protesters attacked the Saudi embassy in Tehran, and Saudi Arabia cut all diplomatic ties with Iran in return.

This text provides general information. Statista assumes no liability for the information given being complete or correct. Due to varying update cycles, statistics can display more up-to-date data than referenced in the text.
